name: Super Bit Adventure: Paragons of Life
description: Super Bit Adventure: Paragons of Life is a perma death dungeon crawler where you take on the role of a mysterious hero that survived a battle inside of a magical prison. Enter the prison and discover what happened on that fateful day and collect the powers of fallen adventurers along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32 Processor: Core 2 Duo E6320 1.86GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT 512MB GDDR3 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 64 Processor: Core i3-3240 3.4GHz Graphics: GeForce GT 440 Storage: 400 MB available space
